title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - KMS over the decade: How architecture evolved to earn customer trust-SEC218
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - KMS 十年演进：架构如何演变以赢得客户信任-SEC218
abstract: Data privacy and sovereignty requirements continue to drive cloud security innovation. This deep dive session traces AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) evolution since inception; from solving fundamental key management challenges to supporting complex regulatory and compliance requirements. Learn about the AWS KMS architecture, operational processes, and technical controls that are in place and how it all comes together to help ensure customer trust. Gain insights into AWS European Sovereign Cloud and how its utilization of partitions and its corporate governance model provide you with stronger security assurance and sovereignty needs.
abstract_cn: 数据隐私和主权要求持续推动云安全创新。本深度会议追溯了AWS密钥管理服务（AWS KMS）自诞生以来的演进历程；从解决基本的密钥管理挑战到支持复杂的监管和合规要求。了解AWS KMS架构、运营流程以及已部署的技术控制措施，以及这一切如何共同协作以帮助确保客户信任。深入了解AWS欧洲主权云及其如何利用分区和公司治理模型为您提供更强的安全保障和主权需求支持。
